title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Teacher-Mediated Workshops and Projects for Enhancing Metacognitive Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can consciously evaluate and adjust problem-solving strategies by utilizing metacognitive questions (e.g., "Why did you choose this method?", "What alternative approaches could be considered?") during project execution.
Learners analyze their own thought processes based on instructor-mediated feedback and document error causes in a structured manner (e.g., 3-step reflection journal).
Learners enhance their decision-making skills by comparing various problem-solving approaches through interactive discussions with peers and selecting optimal strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
